heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly sunny. Valley highs in the low to mid 60s south, upper 50s to lower 60s north. North winds gusting to 20 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Clear, with areas of valley fog late. Lows from the upper 20s to mid 30s, except low to mid 20s in northern cold hollows, and some upper 30s near Lake Champlain. Winds becoming light and variable, except remaining north 5 to 10 mph in the Champlain and Hudson valleys.

heading: Thursday
text: Mostly sunny after any early fog. Valley highs in the low to mid 60s. Variable winds around 5 mph.
